data.description:
Softspace is an intuitive AR workspace where you lay out and organize notes, images, and websites. Connect related concepts, search the web for inspiration, and even get creative suggestions from our AI. This powerful productivity and creativity tool helps you develop the ideas at the heart of your best work.

To get started, visit → docs.soft.space/start

Features:

• Fast, intuitive UI for manipulating objects in 3D
• Work with text, images, and web bookmarks (more soon)
• Create topics to group and organize your ideas
• Built-in web browser with image-saving function
• AI-powered answers, topic suggestions, and clustering
• Import from and export to Dropbox

For more info, visit → www.soft.space

changelog.change_log:
For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.29

## Bug Fixes

- Re-connecting the network keyboard and headset should be much more robust to network interruptions, closing and re-opening Softspace, etc.

## Known Issues

- The Dropbox authentication can expire, preventing the Dropbox import and export features from working. If this happens, please unlink Dropbox from the Account settings pages and relink.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.
- Scrolling in the web browser can sometimes target the incorrect part of the page.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.28.3

## Improvements

- Optimized the mesh representation of Topic item body backing and title backing for 89% reduction in draw calls, which greatly reduces the CPU load of rendering scenes with many topics; e.g. the demo scene.

## Known Issues

- The Dropbox authentication can expire, preventing the Dropbox import and export features from working. If this happens, please unlink Dropbox from the Account settings pages and relink.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.
- Scrolling in the web browser can sometimes target the incorrect part of the page.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.28.2

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed a bug that could cause a hovered image to persist and be saved out of the browser even after the user has stopped touching it with the cursor.

## Improvements

- Improved how scrolling, image saving, and click-and-drag work in the web browser.

## Known Issues

- The Dropbox authentication can expire, preventing the Dropbox import and export features from working. If this happens, please unlink Dropbox from the Account settings pages and relink.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.
- Scrolling in the web browser can sometimes target the incorrect part of the page.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.28.1

## Bug Fixes

- Re-enabled texture filtering on web browsers to prevent shimmering and other aliasing effects; had been disabled for testing and development.

## Improvements

- Moved the status indicator panel above the field-of-view instead of below, where it was interfering with hand interactions such as typing.
- Added a new sky option: Clear Passthrough.
- User is notified of the sky setting when changed.

## Known Issues

- The Dropbox authentication can expire, preventing the Dropbox import and export features from working. If this happens, please unlink Dropbox from the Account settings pages and relink.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.
- Scrolling in the web browser can sometimes target the incorrect part of the page.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.28

## Improvements

- Further optimized web browser initialization sequence and instance pausing.
- Rebalancing between CPU and GPU performance loads for smoother framerate.

## Known Issues

- The Dropbox authentication can expire, preventing the Dropbox import and export features from working. If this happens, please unlink Dropbox from the Account settings pages and relink.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.27

## Improvements

- Further optimized web browser display shader.
- AI-suggested topics no longer duplicate existing topics with the same name but different capitalization.

## Known Issues

- The Dropbox authentication can expire, preventing the Dropbox import and export features from working. If this happens, please unlink Dropbox from the Account settings pages and relink.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.26

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed issue that was causing major performance deterioration with browsers: coast scrolling was never being stopped, even after the coast speed was zero.

## Improvements

- Increased pixel density of browsers for much improved visual quality (possible due to performance optimizations elsewhere).
- Reimposing limit in number of unpaused browser windows due to performance issues. Quest 2 and Pro: limit = 1. Quest 3: limit = 3;
- Reduced browser scrolling frequency from 72 times to 36 times per second for smoother browser performance with minimal visible impact.

## Known Issues

- The Dropbox authentication can expire, preventing the Dropbox import and export features from working. If this happens, please unlink Dropbox from the Account settings pages and relink.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.25

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed issue that would occasionally prevent links from rendering properly.
- Fixed issue that was causing the text selection caret to draw over topic title text.
- Fixed incorrect Softspace Pro plan ordering in plan selection page.

## Improvements

- Enabled multiple web browsers.
- Enabled Boundaryless mode.

## Known Issues

- The Dropbox authentication can expire, preventing the Dropbox import and export features from working. If this happens, please unlink Dropbox from the Account settings pages and relink.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.24

## Improvements

- Added support for WebP image file support.
- Simplified skysphere options.

## Known Issues

- The Dropbox authentication can expire, preventing the Dropbox import and export features from working. If this happens, please unlink Dropbox from the Account settings pages and relink.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.23.1

## Improvements

- Reduced resolution supersampling across all devices in the Quest family to maintain high and stable framerate.
- Reduced sky texture resolution to reduce GPU load with minimal impact on visual quality.
- Pressing the palm menu settings buttons will recenter that settings window.

## Known Issues

- The Dropbox authentication can expire, preventing the Dropbox import and export features from working. If this happens, please unlink Dropbox from the Account settings pages and relink.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.23

## Improvements

- Added a new, photorealistic sky environment.
- Sky settings now persist across app sessions.
- You can now create topics, browsers, and AI queries before signing into a Softspace account.

## Known Issues

- The Dropbox authentication can expire, preventing the Dropbox import and export features from working. If this happens, please unlink Dropbox from the Account settings pages and relink.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.23

## Improvements

- Added a new, photorealistic sky environment.
- Sky settings now persist across app sessions.

## Known Issues

- The Dropbox authentication can expire, preventing the Dropbox import and export features from working. If this happens, please unlink Dropbox from the Account settings pages and relink.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

## Bug Fixes

## Known Issues

- The Dropbox authentication can expire, preventing the Dropbox import and export features from working. If this happens, please unlink Dropbox from the Account settings pages and relink.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.

- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.

- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.22

## Improvements

- Introducing: Softspace subscription plans. Softspace Personal is for everyday productivity and creativity. Softspace Pro is for professional research and ideation. Each is available monthlyor annually.

## Known Issues

- The Dropbox authentication can expire, preventing the Dropbox import and export features from working. If this happens, please unlink Dropbox from the Account settings pages and relink.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.21.1

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed a bug that was causing browser popup windows to instantiate at the position of the user's head, instead in front.

## Improvements

- At long last: we’ve implemented direct interactions! When UI elements are close enough to touch, you can reach out and press or pinch them to use. This feature does not yet work for starting to type on Topic titles or Text items; nor have direct drag interactions been implemented yet (e.g. scrolling browsers via direct touch does not yet work).
- Although we strongly recommend that everyone use a physical or web keyboard with Softspace, we know that the virtual keyboard is an important fallback option for getting started or when another keyboard isn’t handy. The virtual keyboard has been redesigned and upgraded to reflect its continued importance as a text input method.

## Known Issues

- The Dropbox authentication can expire, preventing the Dropbox import and export features from working. If this happens, please unlink Dropbox from the Account settings pages and relink.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.21

## Improvements

- At long last: we’ve implemented direct interactions! When UI elements are close enough to touch, you can reach out and press or pinch them to use. This feature does not yet work for starting to type on Topic titles or Text items; nor have direct drag interactions been implemented yet (e.g. scrolling browsers via direct touch does not yet work).
- Although we strongly recommend that everyone use a physical or web keyboard with Softspace, we know that the virtual keyboard is an important fallback option for getting started or when another keyboard isn’t handy. The virtual keyboard has been redesigned and upgraded to reflect its continued importance as a text input method.

## Known Issues

- The Dropbox authentication can expire, preventing the Dropbox import and export features from working. If this happens, please unlink Dropbox from the Account settings pages and relink.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.20.2

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed a bug that broke AI ideation and mindmapping function.

## Known Issues

- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.

# Softspace v2024.20

## Improvements

- In controller mode, pressing the left controller menu button once will toggle the hand menu. Previously, the menu only displayed when the menu button was held down.
- The positioning of the palm menu is higher up, for better usage ergonomics.
- In controller mode, the cursor now has the same positioning logic as in tracked hand mode, making the selection of items higher up in the field view possible much more comfortable.

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed: Deleting a workspace was not updating the user’s global item count.

## Known Issues

- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.20

## Improvements

- In controller mode, pressing the left controller menu button once will toggle the hand menu. Previously, the menu only displayed when the menu button was held down.
- The positioning of the palm menu is higher up, for better usage ergonomics.
- In controller mode, the cursor now has the same positioning logic as in tracked hand mode, making the selection of items higher up in the field view possible much more comfortable.

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed: Deleting a workspace was not updating the user’s global item count.

## Known Issues

- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.19.1

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed a bug that was causing AI-generated responses to quickly become repetitive as more content was added to a workspace.
- Fixed a bug that was unexpectedly deleting last empty text item in an untitled topic.

## Known Issues

- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.
